name: Anonymus
feedback: I went here with my mom and sister yesterday evening, not only were the staff super friendly and knowledgeable, they all did an amazing job with our nails! We accidentally kept them past closing time but they were super nice about it and didn‚Äôt seem rushed or bothered. We‚Äôll definitely be back next time we‚Äôre in the area! :)

name: Jill Joyce
feedback: Wonderful service and people!  Professional and a lovely environment ‚ù§

name: A E Jensen
feedback: Terrific nail place.  Very professional and very helpful.   I really like them.

name: Joanna Martinez
feedback: Favorite place in Knoxville! They always do a wonderful job, are so kind, and prices are great!

name: Dj Iko
feedback: Great prices, very nice staff. I was very happy with my results and experience here,  I will return with family and friends!

name: Jennifer Martin
feedback: Clean, great pricing, awesome massage/scrub, sweet worker. Will come back.

name: Phyllis Parker
feedback: This location is my favorite for pedicures. Get the deluxe and you will walk out of there with your legs and feet feeling amazing. They take their time and really pamper your feet. I highly recommend this location.

name: Enisa Dzanic Denic
feedback: My first visit was today and I had no appointment. I was seated in a pedicure chair very quickly although they looked pretty busy. My pedicure was great and relaxing done by sweet lady whom I didn‚Äôt catch name. My manicure was done by Anna and it was perfect just the way I wanted.

name: Celia Ball
feedback: The best pedicure in Knoxville! Get the All-Star ($45 as of 10/3/22). My regular polish pedis last a minimum of 6 weeks and the pampering is divine! Very clean shop and very friendly & accommodating staff.

name: Connie Caple
feedback: Best pedicure in town.  And that massage chair is incredible.  üòåI've been a customer since 1993.  ‚ù§

name: Ashley Matthews
feedback: Just got orange/pink/white swirl acrylic for summer and love it! The lady was super communicative and followed the picture I showed her exactly. Also cost me way less than other places around Knoxville

name: Sharon King
feedback: Loved it. The people are awesome and the atmosphere was very relaxing.  It was the most relaxing pedicure I've ever had... I highly recommend giving them a visit...
